评论详情: I ordered this dress in the summer and do not intend to wear it as a beach cover-up.  If someone else has that intention, the item runs large.  I normally wear a medium and ordered a small, which fits perfectly.  It would be too short, but I always wear bicycle shorts under my summer dresses.  I added a small stretchy belt to add a little form.
This is an attractive swim coverup dress for the beach or resort. I ordered size medium (5’7”, 137 lbs), good value purchase to add to my warm weather wardrobe.

评论概述: True to size - more blue than green
评论详情: This is my favorite print and color combination. This particular option is more blue than green.  It is a blend fabric, but it is soft and flowy. Not stiff. It is a forgiving flow on any body type and shape.  Machine wash and dry on low without issue nor shrinking  It works as a cover up, dress, or brunch pj.
This is a decent dress. It fits well and the material is soft. BUT my issue is it is see through to the point I have to wear a slip or something under it so my bra cant be see

This is a super cute little boho/hippie dress. It fits well everywhere except my arms which is a little tight. But that's pretty typical for me. The material is nice, but there is no stretch whatsoever.

评论概述: Nice cover up, but a little blah
评论详情: I wanted something to wear over my swim suit on vacation and this worked for me. It's light weight and loose, so I can fit a skirted suit under it. The problem is that it has no shape at all and just looks a little blah in wearing it. Overall I like the light fabric, although it took a very long time to dry in Mexico. May have been the humidity...maybe. The styling could be improved with maybe a yoke or something at the top to help make it more interesting.

评论概述: Love the print, tight in the shoulders
评论详情: I wear a large and the dress fits but there is no stretch at all so my arms are fine if I reach up but it pulls uncomfortably if I reach forward.  I wanted to love it because the print and cut are great but the arm thing bothers me.

This little dress is made from a thin, lightweight, viscose fabric.  It's very breathable, soft and silky.  I am 5'5", weigh about 160 pounds and wear a 38DD.  A size large had plenty of room to allow for ease of movement for me.  The sleeves extend just beyond my elbows, so I can easily do chores or wash dishes without having to push them out of the way. The elastic shirring on the topside of the sleeves add interest to the design. I chose the 01 Apricot and I love the print and colors.The only concern I have is that I feel that the ties could be damaged easily. I've had tops with these types of ties before, and they eventually became unraveled and had to be clipped off.  I am planning on handwashing this dress (it can be machine washed) and hanging to dry (recommended) to try and keep the ties in good condition.
Comfortable and stylish dress that can also be worn as a longer tunic over jeans or slacks.  True to size fit and lightweight easy care fabric.

评论概述: Love it! Fits true to size.
评论详情: Love this dress! Bought it as a swimsuit coverup. I picked the size based on the size guide, and it fits perfectly. The only thing is I wish the dress had a little bit of stretch.

Pleasantly surprised. I am 6ft 1 in 200 lbs with a pear shape. I purchased this for a swim cover up in an XL will be fantastic. Lightweight brightly colored. Going to purchase one in a size large to wear as a summer dress.

评论概述: cute little dress, true to size
评论详情: Love the beauchy feel of this and the flowy nature. Fits true to size very boho. I love the 3/4 sleeve and very lightweight material will be great in the summer and as a beach coverup to keep the sun off. it was bit long for me just at or below my knee, so I hemmed it a few inches...love it this way. The pattern I chose lends itself to hemming...I chose 02 Pink..., some would look funny.

I feel like these run small. I ordered an XL which is my usual size. I tried it on & it’s tight around the arms & just fits small in general. I love the design but I am returning due to it running small.

评论概述: Lovely light dress for warm summer days ~
评论详情: This is such a cute little dress and I will happily wear it this spring is summer.  It *is* thin so one can choose to wear it as-is, or follow my lead and wear another tank dress under it for coverage.  I wore this with leggings and a lovely long sweater for colder-weather wear.  It seems to be made well and I might even get another pattern or two.  Enjoy.

It is made well with no loose threads and soft poly blend fabric. Jersey type feel but no stretch whatsoever.  It is a very straight piece so it there is no curve to your body the dress looks pretty plain.  It was tight on my upper arms when I pull forward so I would say it runs a tad on the small side or made to fit less "built" woman as it was also tight on my bum.

This beach dress is so cute on.  I chose my size based on the chest size.  Since I'm larger busted, I went up one size, and it fits perfectly.  I like that it is more of an A-line dress and not straight.  It fits my bottom so much better.  The material is 100% viscose and it is so nice and soft.  It's machine washable, but I think I would hang to dry.  It's a very comfortable dress and would look great with a pair of sandals.  I would highly recommend!

评论概述: Order up a size if you want loose. Not cotton like the traditional dresses in this style.
评论详情: I usually wear a M or L in tops or dresses- this Large "just" fits so I would say it runs a bit small. It's the shoulders and upper arms that seem on the small/slim side. The length is good and sizing through the hip is fine. I will be taking care not to put in dryer to insure I don't shrink it. This dress is very similar to the thin cotton Indian dresses I used to get 20 years ago or more- but this one is viscose rather than cotton. Still breathable but is sort of shiny and likely won't fade the same as the vintage cotton ones from India. Honestly I would prefer the thin cotton 'old school' version of these dresses but I just don't see them anymore so this one will do.

This Boho Summer Dress is just okay to me.  It is well made, the material is good but the pattern/design is not so great to me.  It did not look like what I ordered.  In addition to me not caring for the design, it did not fit quite as well as I would have hoped.  This particular dress is not one that I would wear outside the house but it is perfect for me for around the house.  I use it as a night gown.

NOT A FAN AT ALL. THE MATERIAL IS SUPER THIN AND IT HAS A VERY ODD FIT TO IT. (ALSO, SIZE UP.) IT SITS WIERD IN THE FRONT AND IN THE ARMS, WHICH THE ARMS ARE SMALL FITTED TOO. IT'S A CUTE DESIGN, BUT NOT A GREAT EXECUTION.
This dress is so cute...I love the pattern. The fabric so be very cool to wear in the summer,  and it fits great!

评论概述: Cute design but not the most flattering
评论详情: I will definitely use this as a beach cover up and not as a dress.  I am 5’2” and about 155 lbs, and I ordered a size L.  It fits fine, but it kinda sits like a tent or a moo moo on me.  It’s nice quality fabric and the design is very pretty, I just wish it was slightly more form fitting to be flattering.
Very cute beach summer dress. The fabric is thin but not see-through, making it perfect for summer. I really like it.

评论概述: Dress Up or Dress Casual - Love this little boho dress!
评论详情: What a fun little dress.  I ordered size Lg.  I’m 5’7 ½” and 167 lbs.  I carry most of my weight below my waist.  The large fit perfectly.  If you are evenly distributed or between sizes, you may wish to order on the smaller size.  I used the steamer to remove wrinkles; worked great.  I love the gathering on the sleeves.  Design is great and looks good on me. Everything seems well sewn.  You could dress this up or dress it very casual with flip-flops (my style).  The red is more of a rose-red; it looks fabulous with the black accents.  Love it!

As soon as I put this on, I knew it would become a “favorite” or “go to” piece of apparel.  The material is smooth almost slinky feeling. The fit is perfect.  Feels as though it was made for me only!  I’m more than pleased with this coverup.  It can go anywhere and be appropriate whether it’s through a hotel lobby or local restaurant. Length and sleeve length are perfect.  I’m shorter than most so I can really appreciate a proper fit.  Order your regular size and it’ll be perfect.  Washes well and hang dries without wrinkles.

I'm reviewing the Zeagoo Womens Boho Summer Dress with 3/4 sleeves.  This dress has a tassel tie at the neck, the fabric is 100% Viscose and it feels smooth, when I rub the fabric with my fingers it feels like fine cotton.  The main color is muted Red (it's in between Pantone 192 and Pantone 193 color), the prints are crisp, no over-printing and the entire dress has a pleasing color combination.  I'm 5'4" at 115 lbs and it fitted me well.  It has clean stitching and no loose threads.  I would wash in cold water and hang dry (to preserve the size).

This dress is actually really adorable. It's a lightweight fabric perfect for summer but not thin enough to be see through. It fits true to size and is generous through the hips. The pattern is really pretty I got the 'white'. My only complaint is that it has a little but of a chemical smell when new, but I'm sure that will go away with the first washing.
